code: import{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";let searchTypes=[{value:'도서명',label:"도서명"},{value:'카테고리',label:"카테고리"}];const validateText=function(){let text=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";if(text.length<1){return"$null";}return text;};export const Header=()=>{const[Selected,setSelected]=useState(searchTypes[0].value);const[text,setText]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSelect=event=>{setSelected(event.target.value);};const handleText=event=>{setText(event.target.value);};const handleBtnClick=event=>{const path="/result/".concat(Selected,"/").concat(validateText(text));navigate(path);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"th",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"\uCE74\uCE74\uC624\uD074\uB77C\uC6B0\uB4DC \uB3C4\uC11C\uAD00"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:"\uB77C\uC774\uC5B8",src:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/assets/ryan_img.png"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{className:"searchSelect",required:true,onChange:handleSelect,value:Selected,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{value:searchTypes[0].value,children:[" ",searchTypes[0].label," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{value:searchTypes[1].value,children:[" ",searchTypes[1].label," "]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"searchBox",size:"30",onChange:handleText,value:text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"searchButton",onClick:handleBtnClick,children:"\uB3C4\uC11C \uAC80\uC0C9"})]})]});};
